TopicTitle: Fuel(ing) Cells... RO... How do they Work!?!?

Articles.Content:
I've tried everything sensible to get a fuel cell in RO to operate.

Regardless how it is attached a LH2 LO tank (tried various tank types), my command pod electric runs to zero, the fuel cell electric runs to zero and the LO LH2 tanks just sit there - and no electric generation occurs.

Can anyone provide a step by step procedure to utilise a fuel cell in RO that works?

Any help is much appreciated - I'm scratching my head in frustration.
